p: The rats were randomly divided into 3 groups ( n = 10): control group (C), PF group and SPF group. The C group was administered with water. The PF and SPF groups were orally administered with PF extract (2 g/kg) or SPF extract (2 g/kg) once per day for four weeks, respectively. All animals were sacrificed after collection of blood from the abdominal aorta. The blood samples were promptly centrifuged at 3,000 × g for 10 min and the supernatants were stored at −20 °C before analysis.
